name: EitherOr
0:
”Alexa, play would you rather”
”Alexa, start would you rather”
”Alexa, open would you rather”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: would you rather
Developer Terms of Use
des:
**100's new questions are added every month!

Either/Or (previously Would you rather for Family) is a simple but addicting game where you choose between two lighthearted and silly situations. Will the rest of the world agree with your decision? You have to try the skill to find out! 

Enjoy hundreds of fun, family-friendly questions to keep all ages entertained for hours.

Play Either/Or (previously Would you rather for Family) at a sleepover, at a party, on family game night or simply to pass the time. Questions are continually added so check back often for updates. Enjoy the game, and I look forward to hearing your suggestions about how it could be improved!

--- Multi-Player Mode ---
Either/Or (previously Would you rather for Family) is now available in multiplayer mode. You can enjoy it with your entire family or play by yourself.

--- Example Commands ---
"Alexa, play standard edition"
"Alexa, let's start over"
"Alexa, repeat"
"Alexa, skip"
"Alexa, help"

ROUTINE:
You can make an Alexa routine to activate Would you rather for family to choose between 2 lighthearted situations. To do this, launch the Alexa app on your phone or tablet and follow the instructions:

1. Tap the hamburger icon in the upper left corner
2. Tap Routines
3. Tap the + icon in the upper right corner to open up a New Routine tab
4. Tap "When this happens" to choose the trigger. For example, you can select Voice and then type "Either Or"
5. Tap "Add action" and select "Skills"
6. Tap Your skills and find the "EIther or" skill in the list
7. Tap "Save" in the upper right corner to create your new routine!

To play Either or questions, say, "Alexa, open Would You Rather"

MORE GAMING SKILLS ON ALEXA
Explore our other games on Alexa:
- Today's Trivia
- Lucky Trivia
- Trivia Battle
- True or False for Family
- Fact or Fib

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! You can email us at hello@voicegames.ai. We'd love to hear from you!
